metadata.title: CVE-2022-48671 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:cgroup: Add missing cpus_read_lock() to cgroup_attach_task_all()syzbot is hitting percpu_rwsem_assert_held(&cpu_hotplug_lock) warning atcpuset_attach() [1], for commit 4f7e7236435ca0ab ("cgroup: Fixthreadgroup_rwsem <-> cpus_read_lock() deadlock") missed thatcpuset_attach() is also called from cgroup_attach_task_all().Add cpus_read_lock() like what cgroup_procs_write_start() does.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
